channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge delays key ruling on fate of Trump hush money conviction
item.description: A New York jury found Donald Trump guilty on 34 counts of falsifying business records related to a hush money payment to porn start Stormy Daniels.

item.title: Apple's four-phone strategy is lagging. One idea to reviving sales: Cut the cameras
item.description: Every year since 2020, when Apple moved to a four-model lineup, one of them has lagged in terms of sales.

item.title: Exxon CEO says Trump won’t be able to ‘unleash’ new energy production
How Tesla can thrive in a Trump administration
AT&T’s CEO says AI may cause power shortages and it could be ‘the next big social issue in the United States’
item.description: Gartner has echoed that by 2027, AI demand will exceed power utilities’ capacity

item.title: Wall Street sees a buying opportunity in these crypto mining stocks as bitcoin marches to new records
item.description: Some bitcoin miners are giving investors an opportunity to get in on the cryptocurrency's big postelection rally.

item.title: Martha Stewart, the original influencer, says she hates the ‘trad wife’ trend that’s pervaded social media
item.description: "I hate it so much,” the 83-year-old Stewart said.

item.title: After its entire board resigned overnight, 23andMe will cut over 200 employees and its cancer research in an urgent bid to nurse the company back to health
item.description: The DNA-testing firm said in a Tuesday SEC filing, “there is substantial doubt about the company’s ability to continue.”

item.title: Election rally hits brake as investors await inflation update — live coverage
Here’s what the CEO of NASDAQ is learning from her son in his mid-20s
item.description: "He was learning market structure—he didn’t even realize he was learning it."

item.title: Family offices becoming 'economic powerhouse' in private company deals
item.description: Family offices are increasingly bypassing private equity funds and buying stakes in private companies directly, according to a new survey.

item.title: 23andMe says there’s substantial doubt it can stay in business
Gen Z is obsessed with the punishing ‘Winter Arc challenge,’ but an expert says it’s the wrong way to reach goals
item.description: There's a healthier way to build sustainable health habits.

item.title: 28% of credit card users are still paying off last year's holiday tab. But that's an improvement
item.description: Americans tend to overspend during the holiday season. In fact, some shoppers are still paying off last year's purchases.

item.title: Holiday forecast powering Shopify’s stock toward its best session ever
